# Invoicemonk

> Compliance-first invoicing, accounting, and financial management platform for small businesses and freelancers.

Invoicemonk is an all-in-one business finance platform that helps freelancers, consultants, contractors, and small businesses create professional invoices, track expenses, accept payments, manage accounting, generate estimates, and issue receipts — with built-in tax compliance for multiple countries.

## Core Products

- [Invoicing](https://invoicemonk.com/invoicing): Create and send professional, tax-compliant invoices with automatic numbering, multi-currency support, payment tracking, and branded templates.
- [Expenses](https://invoicemonk.com/expenses): Track and categorize business expenses with receipt scanning (OCR), automatic categorization, and tax-deductible expense identification.
- [Payments](https://invoicemonk.com/payments): Accept payments via Stripe (international) and Paystack (Nigeria) with embedded payment links on invoices. Multi-currency support.
- [Accounting](https://invoicemonk.com/accounting): Automated bookkeeping, chart of accounts, financial reports (P&L, balance sheet, cash flow), bank reconciliation, and multi-entity support.
- [Estimates](https://invoicemonk.com/estimates): Create professional quotes and proposals with one-click conversion to invoices. Supports estimate, quote, and proposal workflows.
- [Receipts](https://invoicemonk.com/receipts): Generate and manage payment receipts with digital storage, OCR scanning, and compliance-ready documentation.

## Additional Features

- [Client Management](https://invoicemonk.com/client-management): CRM-lite features for managing client contacts, payment history, and communication.
- [Free Invoice Generator](https://invoicemonk.com/free-invoice-generator): Create professional invoices for free without signing up.
- [Invoice Verification Portal](https://invoicemonk.com): Clients can verify invoice authenticity through a public portal.
- Credit notes and corrections
- Recurring invoices and retainer billing
- Milestone-based billing
- Multi-currency invoicing
- Custom branding and premium templates

## Pricing

All plans include a free tier. Paid plans vary by region:

- **Free**: 5 invoices & 5 receipts/month, 1 currency, accounting & expense tracking
- **Starter** (Nigeria only): ₦2,000/mo — Unlimited invoices, 3 currencies, in-app support
- **Professional** (recommended): From $4–$8/mo (varies by country) — Unlimited everything, 5 team members, custom branding, no watermark
- **Business**: From $12–$29/mo (varies by country) — Enterprise features, unlimited team, API access, advanced reports

Regional pricing:
- Nigeria: ₦2,000–₦8,000/mo
- United States: $5–$19/mo
- United Kingdom: £4–£12/mo
- Canada: C$7–C$20/mo
- Australia: A$8–A$29/mo

Annual billing saves 20% (international) or 2 months free (Nigeria).

## Tax Compliance

Built-in compliance for 5 countries:
- **Nigeria**: FIRS (Federal Inland Revenue Service) — VAT-compliant invoicing
- **United Kingdom**: HMRC — Making Tax Digital (MTD) ready
- **United States**: IRS — Tax-ready invoices with required documentation
- **Canada**: CRA — GST/HST compliant
- **Australia**: ATO — GST-compliant tax invoices
